title.rendered: Agilent Technologies International Pvt Ltd has associated with Smile Foundation for promoting conducive learning environment in a Government School

content.rendered:
Agilent Technologies International Pvt Ltd has associated with Smile Foundation for promoting conducive learning environment in a Government School

Agilent Technologies International Pvt Ltd has associated with Smile Foundation for promoting conducive learning environment in a Government School situated at Nawada Fatehpur, Haryana. Approximately 650 children are being benefitted under this initiative. The project focuses on enabling a learning environment and engaging the community members to sensitize them on the importance of education.

Agilent is a global leader in life sciences, diagnostics, and applied chemical markets. Based on more than 50 years of insight and innovation, Agilent instruments, software, services, solutions, and people provide trusted answers to customers’ most challenging questions.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 15,00,000 children and their families every year, through more than 400 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 2000 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
